statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM customer_behavior WHERE purchase_amount > 500 GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) as total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 25;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';

SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
